name: Knee cut (same side / HQ)
why: Your opponent frames, turns, and squares up with you
description: - As they frame and start to square up, go with their momentum. Scoop the knee up and drive them over to the leg drag
b1: Nothing, you pass to side control
b2: You get put back in standard half-guard

name: Duck Under
why: Your opponent brings there leg over the top and tries to collect your knee
description: - Keep pinning the bottom leg down, while you duck under the top leg, pulling the knee as you go. Make sure you windshield wiper your feet, hiding your foot behind their knee as you duck through. Reach over their body as you turn your hips and collapse their guard.
b1: Nothing, you pass to side control
b2: You get put back in standard half-guard

name: Crab Ride
why: Your opponent inverts through to a Reverse DLR, Kiss of the Dragon back take
description: - As your opponent inverts through for the Kiss of the Dragon back take, you counter by diving through to a crab ride, getting behind both their knees. Once there, drive their knee down to the mat and come up into the Leg Drag
b1: Nothing, you pass to side control
b2: You get put back in standard half-guard

name: Double Unders Pass
why: Bring their leg over the top
b1: Nothing, you pass to side control
b2: You get put back in standard half-guard

name: Double Unders Pass1
why: Bring their leg over the top
b1: Nothing, you pass to side control
b2: You get put back in standard half-guard

name: Double Unders Pass2
why: Bring their leg over the top
b1: Nothing, you pass to side control
